authorisation_access.description: Determins if an admin is allowed to access supervisor routes without the correct authorisation set.
authorisation_access.note: can be relative from app/public/.. or absolute

logo_url.description: The logo shown on the desktop header. The URL may be relative from app/public/.. or absolute
logo_url.note: can be relative from app/public/.. or absolute

background.description: The background colour used for the desktop and mobile headers.

rainbow.description: Determins if a rainbow is shown in the footer.

accessibilty_buttons.description: Determins if accessibilty buttons are shown in the footer.

collect_user_agent.description: Determins if user agent strings are collected.

collect_referrer.description: Determins if referrer urls are collected.
